hero.content: Massinissa Amalou, software & solution architect based in Paris. Expert in designing robust and scalable architectures, I support teams in their strategic digital transformation and information system modernization projects.

about.title: About
about.content: Senior software architect with 6+ years of experience, specialized in technical leadership, REST API governance and complex information system modernization. My methodology covers the entire project lifecycle: target architecture definition, fullstack development (React.js, Angular, Vue.js, NestJS), production deployment and monitoring. Expert in cloud-native and microservices application architectures, I ensure solution robustness, scalability and performance. My interventions at Autodistribution, Crédit Agricole CIB and Société Générale demonstrate my ability to lead large-scale digital transformations.

contact.title: Let's stay in touch
contact.description: feel free to reach out to discuss your projects, talk about software architecture or simply get to know each other.

career.description: technical intervention on several strategic projects, including application architecture design, API governance, and product support. projects: store api (api marketplace), hub360 (crm platform), lynx (multi-entity erp), mead (b2b extranet redesign), catgr (european bodywork repository).

frontend technical leader, responsible for developing a cross-functional design system. projects: loanscape (loan back-office redesign with angular 15), pure pixel (multi-technology design system). team management in france and singapore, product backlog management and agile ceremonies facilitation.

frontend developer responsible for maintaining a client/advisor relationship application and developing a chatbot. projects: interact (client/advisor relationship with backbone.js), chatbot (conversational tool in react.js).

scholarship.description: in-depth training in software architecture, application development and IT project management.

scholarship.degree: bts sio - it services for organizations
scholarship.description: technical training in application development, system administration and IT infrastructure management.

projects.title: STORE API
projects.description: reference data api marketplace for autodistribution, including rest api design, release management and governance. centralized solution enabling teams to share and consume standardized data.

projects.title: Pure Pixel Design System
projects.description: development of a multi-technology design system (angular, react, vue.js) for crédit agricole cib frontend projects. development team leadership and agile ceremonies facilitation.

projects.title: LYNX ERP
projects.description: multi-entity repository erp standardizing repositories through a central erp with store api integration. modular architecture enabling complex multi-entity data management.

skills.title: Architecture
skills.description: expertise in application architecture design, api governance and system modernization. i design robust, scalable solutions aligned with business challenges, from target definition to production deployment.

skills.title: Management
skills.description: technical leadership of development teams, management in france and internationally. agile ceremonies facilitation, product backlog management and team support in adopting best practices.

skills.title: Frontend
skills.description: deep mastery of modern frameworks with particular expertise in react, angular and vue.js. cross-functional design systems development and scalable micro front-end solutions.

skills.title: Backend
skills.description: robust api development and technical governance. expertise in nest.js and rest architectures. release management, monitoring and performance optimization.

meta.title: Massinissa Amalou - Software & Solution Architect

meta.keywords: software architect, solution architect, fullstack developer, React, Angular, Vue.js, NestJS, API, microservices, Paris
